document_data.mainbody:
esser Evils is the second novel of the Brimstone Angels series by Erin M. Evans. It is followed by The Adversary, the third book of The Sundering series.
* Adolican Rhand
* Aubrin "Brin" Crownsilver
* Dahl Peredur
* Farideh
* Goodman Florren
* Havilar
* Lorcan
* Mehen
* Mira Zawad
* Tam Zawad
